title: Hacked...?
body: I was I guess recently hacked without the password changing but they've cleared my friends list... Is there any way I can get this restored?

replies.body:
Well the first step, if you suspect your account has been compromised, is obviously to change your password and the password of the attached email address.

Your next step is to submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If the account isn't secure they may ask you to follow through the account recovery process to verify ownership and secure the account. Once that's done/if all is good they may or may not be able to help you with the friend list. 

That would depend on what caused the purge, but also, given that friend requests are a two-party system (you and the friend), they may not be able to just restore it. Regardless, they are your best bet.
